attributes.action: Introduce Free Biometric Identity Cards for all residents in Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have nothing to hide. There is no meaningful argument against allowing personal data including our Biometric Data, provided such data is 100% reliable and is only used in the detection of crime and the apprehension of criminals. Identity Cards should be freely issued and the Police should be permitted to stiop and search to ensure all residents possess a valid ID Card and given the right to validate this with a DNA check if necessary.
